chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> distinct_pairs_and LockServ_network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)

Premises:
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
distinct_pairs_and = fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop Arguments distinct_pairs_and {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Output = Msg : Set
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in msg : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments msg {P MultiParams}
Inductive unit : Set := tt : unit
LockServ_network_network_invariant = fun p q : packet => (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Locked -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Locked -> False) : packet -> packet -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
InputHandler = fun (nm : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientIOHandler c m | Server => ServerIOHandler m end : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
LockServ_nwnw_input_handlers_old_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p p' : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> LockServ_network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ms -> pSrc p' = h -> LockServ_network_network_invariant p p'
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> pSrc p = h -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
post_input_analyze_sent_packet : forall (h : name) (p : packet) (ms : list (name * msg)) (l : list packet), In p (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms ++ l) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms /\ h = pSrc p \/ In p l
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
post_net_analyze_sent_packet : forall (h : name) (p : packet) (ms : list (name * msg)) (xs ys : list packet), In p (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms ++ xs ++ ys) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms /\ h = pSrc p \/ In p (xs ++ ys)
locks_correct_net_handlers : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st')
locks_correct_unlock_net_handlers_old : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (q : packet), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma q -> LockServ_network_network_invariant p q -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q
locks_correct_locked_net_handlers_old : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (q : packet), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_locked sigma q -> LockServ_network_network_invariant p q -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q
locks_correct_unlock_net_handlers_new : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (q : packet), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> In (pDst q, pBody q) ms -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q
locks_correct_locked_net_handlers_new : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (q : packet), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> In (pDst q, pBody q) ms -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : name) (ps : list (name * msg)) => map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
ServerNetHandler_cases : forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st)
do_send_packets = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0) (src : do_name) (ps : list (do_name * do_msg)) => map (fun m : do_name * do_msg => {| do_pSrc := src; do_pDst := fst m; do_pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0), do_name -> list (do_name * do_msg) -> list do_packet Arguments do_send_packets {P0 P} _ _%list_scope
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
at_head_of_queue = fun (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) => exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = c :: t : (Name -> Data) -> Client_index -> Prop Arguments at_head_of_queue _%function_scope
locks_correct_locked_intro : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index) (st' : Data), pDst p = Client c -> held (sigma (Client c)) = false -> queue st' = c :: t -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') p
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_ind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l
step_ordered_sind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
locks_correct_unlock_true_to_false : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (p : packet) (x : Client_index) (st' : Data), at_head_of_queue sigma x -> held st' = false -> pSrc p = Client x -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st') p
snoc_at_head_of_queue_preserved : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), queue st' = queue (sigma Server) ++ [x] -> forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

``` 
intros.
intros h i sigma u st' out ms H.
unfold distinct_pairs_and, LockServ_network_network_invariant.
intros H_h.
induction ms as [| [name msg] ms' IHms].
- simpl. apply True.
- simpl. split.
  + intros y Hy. apply H_h.
    simpl. right. apply in_eq.
  + apply IHms.
    intros y Hy. apply H_h. simpl. right. apply in_cons. apply Hy.
```

original: intros. intros h i sigma u st' out ms H. unfold distinct_pairs_and, LockServ_network_network_invariant. intros H_h. induction ms as [| [name msg] ms' IHms]. - simpl. apply True. - simpl. split. + intros y Hy. apply H_h. simpl. right. apply in_eq. + apply IHms. intros y Hy. apply H_h. simpl. right. apply in_cons. apply Hy.
